content.detailedDescription:
Tonight, at approx 9:10pm, my husband and i witnessed two bright orbs of light moving incredibly fast from east-to-west in the southern sky, it was as  if they became one for a split-second and then split-apart again,  this all took place within 5-6 seconds! so, i searched the internet to see if there were any additional reports and yes, this sight was witnessed across texas by the following reports: 

katy, tx: glowing orbs flying fast no sound. burleson, tx: two bright lights traveling very fast with one speeding up to the other, then one disappeared and the other continued straight. katy tx: bright blue led type circular shapes moving across sky to the nw in katy, texas. college station, tx: bright light flew thru sky, split in two and then disappeared. austin, texas: tandem lights streaked  across the sky over austin moving incredibly fast without making a sound. wimberly, texas: one glowing light, airplane like, but moving far too fast, divided into two orbs���. additional reports also from: nacogdoches-tx, thorndale-tx,  mesquite-tx, cypress mill-tx, manor-tx, manvel-tx.
content.summary: Two orbs of light, moving incredibly fast, become one and then two again and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: I was downloading a song to my phone and then proceeded to patrol the highway . played the music and was getting into it when i noticed an object fly low at a high rate of speed . my initial reaction was to contact dispatch and let them know an aircraft was flying low. i then thought it was prob just a bottle rocket but it couldn't have because it had a straight flight pattern. i then pulled up next to the other officer on shift and she asked if i saw the same thing .
content.summary: Cylinder shape two green lights

content.detailedDescription:
while going out to take a photo of the moon i saw a few lights in the sky, at first i thought it was a plane, but the light in front started to go faster, and then the second light faded away, and then the light in front faded, but i think there was more than just two lights, and there was green color in the lights too, and  white, that is why i first thought it was an airplane, but the lights were going too fast for it to be an airplane and  too slow to be a meteor !! i tried to take a photo, but i think my camera was still in macro mode!!.......
*i suppose it still could have been a meteor??
content.summary: Lights went across the sky at 9:10. they looked similar to earthlights. i was able to take 3 photo, but my camera was set in macro mode and the camera didn't pick up any green that could be seen with the naked eye.

content.detailedDescription: Just before 11:00pm, there were five of us sitting on our back deck at our home enjoying a nice summer evening.  my 22 year old daughter screamed, "dad, look".  to the northwest, between the trees in our back yard, there was an orange light that was moving toward the east.  it was bright, not star-like, but like an orange roman candle ball, larger than the landing lights we frequently see on approaching aircraft.  it was moving slowly, on the horizontal, and disappeared behind the trees.  a few minutes later, maybe 5 minutes, a second 'orb' was seen, also orange in color, to the south-west of our position, about 30 degrees above the horizon.  it faded out (or entered clouds) quickly.  we talked about it for some time, trying to debunk what we saw as possibly being chinese lanterns or something.  they were located in completely different areas of the sky, and if they were, they were not launched from the same location, as they were clearly at least 2 or more miles apart, and there was no surface wind.  as we were debating what we were seeing, the third one appeared, to the left of where the first one was seen.  it was above the trees, looked to be either rising in the sky, or approaching straight toward us.  it also was orange-red in color, and increased in brightness (like it was coming out of the clouds) and brightened to a yellow or yellow-orange color.  it moved 'up' in the sky, maybe to 45 degrees above the horizon and stopped.  there appeared to be a small orange light that fell from the bottom of it, and it then proceeded to turn to the east, almost a 90 degree turn, and continued in an easterly direction, past as many as three trees, before either fading out or re-entering the clouds.  we attempted to video, but couldn't capture it before it faded out.  we waited excitedly for maybe another 30 minutes to see if it would return...But didn't see it after we got a film camera out, too.  thanks.  jc.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange lights appearing out of cloud bank

content.detailedDescription: On my way home i saw a rectangular light move across the sky. it was very fast and big. it moved a short distance and then stopped, then did the same thing, but starting from a different spot then where it stopped. it did that about 4 or 5 times.
content.summary: Square light moving rapidly across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Just got done watering the plants.

i started to gaze at the supermoon as came up over the horizon. then witnessed a very bright light traveling at a super rate of speed e to w. i tracked it across the sky for about 4-6 seconds. i initially thought it was a helicopter as it appeared somewhat low to the ground at first. when it was side on from my point of view i noticed it had no blinking lights.  thats when it split into 2  parts and then disappeared! wow

good to see other reports on here with the same experience.
content.summary: Watched the supermoon come up over horizon. witnessed bright light traveling at a super rate of speed e to w split into 2 and then disappear!

content.detailedDescription:
My kids and i were swimming in our pool at night when my son spotted 2 orbs travelling at a high rate of speed coming from the sse crossing the sky going nne. one sphere was greenish and it pulsated while the other one was white. they were about at a 30-40 degree angle from the horizon looking east. they made no sound whatsoever. at first it appeared to be a normal plane as the orbs seemed to travel where normal plane lights are placed along the wings. however, as they were crossing over the horizon they appeared to take their own independent flight pattern, crisscrossing each other but remaining together. i used to live near an afb in florida so i'm used to seeing f16's fly near me, these orbs however traveled at least twice as fast and made no sound. 

i live in a very busy air space with lots of planes (both commercial and smaller private ones). there were commercial planes at the time but travelling much slower and it much higher altitude. these orbs were flying much lower, similar to what a turbo prop plane would fly in this area (there are 2 small airports nearby. i've seen many smaller planes fly at a similar altitude at night, however, these orbs were much larger than plane lights when compared at the same altitude.(basketball vs. softball)both my oldest son and i observed the phenomenon which only lasted a few seconds.
content.summary: Glowing orbs flying fast,no sound

content.detailedDescription: Outside with 2 friends loading up a truck at approximately 9pm central time. it was still dusk. we were all facing se. i saw two bright white lights approaching swiftly, heading nw in what appeared to be a formation,in tandem. at first i thought they were helos (helicopters) as they appeared that low to the ground but were moving at a speed unattainable by helos. i asked "what are those lights?" one friend looked up and remarked "i don't know!". at that moment the light on our left appeared to change velocity and meet the light on the right either parallel or directly to the aft at which point it simply disappeared.  the light on the right continued straight and also seemed to abruptly dissappear. both friends commented on the remarkable speed. there was no downward movement one would expect from a meteorite, no arching and no fading.  in addition no sound whatsoever and no universal aircraft lighting (red & green). i am still in awe of the "formation", height from the ground, change in velocity and the fact they appeared to travel directly over us.
content.summary: 2 bright lights traveling very fast with one speeding up to the other, disappeared & the other continued straight

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work. traveling north in hwy 26. i saw about 5 to 8 bright red glowing balls that seemed to be only about 100 feet off the ground moving at a fault rapid pace from east to west. i immediately  pulled over and tried to record them on my iphone. as i was trying to record them they started to disappear but i noticed three more in a straight line traveling almost overhead. they were so bright they cast light onto the highway overpass that was about 200 feet away. they moved at a constant pace, never deviating in direction or pace. they made absolutely no noise. they travelled east to west but the wind was barely noticeable but the wind was blowing from the south. i was amazed that none of the passing cars seemed interested at all. i tried to video the events but playing back the video it only recorded 3 seconds even though i was positive i was recording the whole time. then as quickly as i saw then they faded out if sight. they seemed to be about the size if a beach ball and the light never flickered.
content.summary: Red/orange glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription: 7.12.2014 9:10 pm central time cinco ranch/ katy, tx saw bright blue orbs shooting across toward nw sky. thought neighborhood drone at first but it was shooting mega fast and looked like it broke into more parts and disappeared. no noise.
content.summary: Bright blue led type circular shapes move across sky to the nw in katy, tx

content.detailedDescription:
i was fishing in my boat with a friend in front of the bay of concepcion near mulege, baja sur california.  i had a camera within reach.  nothing spectacular occurred and after a minute i asked my fishing partner what i was looking at.  by the time i realized this was not a normal aircraft it disappeared behind a fairly low cloud (maybe 6 or 7 thousand feet up at most).
this could have been some type of experimental military craft as it did not accelerate faster than humans can stand g forces or anything like that.  were it not for the morning full moon, i would not have paid any attention to this vehicle.  it did nothing out of the ordinary.  my friend corroborated my analysis that this was a ufo.
on christmas night, 1978, i saw a spectacular phenomenon near cabo san lucas.  i am sure i reported that event.  this was not spectacular but i was able to see a round, white, solid vehicle traveling in a deliberate fashion under 100 mph.  i estimate its size at 20 to 150 feet in diameter.  since it was in the air, it is hard to estimate its size without knowing its exact distance.
content.summary: Glanced at morning full moon and noticed round object slowly passing while fishing in a boat.  watched for several minutes before realizing it was extraordinary and missed photo chance when it went behind cloud.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i went out to the patio to smoke a cigarette, like we always do. i was sitting in the chair that you can see the water from better, looking at the sky. when i first noticed it, i thought ohh a shooting star and i said. "bae look." at that same time a guy in the pool said to someone else in the pool."look at the white light in the sky." by this time i knew it wasnt a shooting start. it wasnt a plane and no im not on drugs. there really was a ball of light. it had this greenish white glow with a trail behind it. this was crazy and intense all in one. it made my heart pound like i had just ran a marathon. it flew by so fast and all i could do was watch. as it went from one side to the other. then it just vanished. disapeired into nothing and it was gone. at that point, being the girl that i am, i told my boyfriend im going in, that freaked me out.
content.summary: It was a white/green glow flying low with now sound really fast.

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting in the passenger seat when something caught my eyes to the left. looked and saw two bright lights flying across the sky. told my boyfriend who was driving to look and as he looked the objects moved together then swiftly moved apart then disappeared.
content.summary: Bright light flew through sky, split in two then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Between 8:30 and 9:00 pm my mother, my little cousin and i walked to the end of our court to observe the beautiful full moon. we were staring in awe, when we noticed two very fast white lights flying real low streaking from just the left side of our view with absoulty no sound. and disappeared in about 15 seconds or so.All three of us seen this. we know it was not any kind of air craft we ever saw around here. strange indeed.I have witnessed quit a bit over the years, never reported one before. but for a split second i thought we were under attack..Lol maybe missile's.. but then they just disappeared as fast as we saw them.
content.summary: Two very bright lights flying super fast with a comet like tail chasing them then just disappeared. lasted approx. 15 seconds

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were standing on the top floor of an 8-story parking garage looking out over the congress street bridge in downtown austin, texas. at approximately 9 p.M. we saw two white lights moving at incredible speed from east to west just over downtown. at first i believed it was a low-flying military jet, but there was no sound and the two lights separated as they passed overhead. there was absolutely no sound, no blinking lights and they passed from horizon to horizon (as much as i could see) within a matter of seconds. the only possible explanation would be that they were tandem asteroids, but the flight path of these seem deliberate.Plus, asteroids close enough to fire up (creating the light) from the friction of entering earth's atmosphere would most likely be heard.
content.summary: Tandem lights streaked across the sky over austin, texas moving incredibly fast and without making a sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking at the full moon to the east,noticed fast moving large whitish blue object soaring across the sky to the north. large.Veryfast. then it split into
2 and disappeared on the north horizon.

we were amazed that it was such high speec.
content.summary: Bright blue white light, flying in straight line,then appearing as 2 objects. very fast moving .

content.detailedDescription:
July 12, 2014, ,y wife and i were sitting on our porch in wimberely tx, with two friends. we were watching the super moon, which had just risen within a few minutes earlier (maybe 15).  

i saw the object first, which appeared as a glowing white light, much like a typical airplane, but larger, and moving far faster than any plane i've ever seen.  there was no noise.  i alerted the other to the object, as soon as the realization hit me that this was not a plane.  the speed of the object, rather than the brightness, was more unusual.

the other three people with me jumped up, and ran down the front steps, upon which the lead person, female, named ann, saw the object arc slightly over the roof-line, whereupon it split into two lights.

i observed the tail-end of the object disappearing over the roof-line, and just before it did, i too observed the object diverge into two orbs of equal size, with one arcing north and dissipating into darkness, while the last continued on the same trajectory until out of sight on account of the roof.

we discussed at length, and google'd common sightings, and the best we found were drones or space junk that commonly divides into two pieces.

more info: we can commonly view planes over the same treeline/horizon, and this was moving far too fast to be one.  also visible at the same time was the moon, obviously stationary.  the orb/light was so fast that each viewer remarked upon the speed.
content.summary: One glowing light, airplane like, bu moving far too fast, divided into two orbs

content.detailedDescription:
We (married couple) were watching the supermoon, and just to the left of it 2 bright green lights appeared and streaked across the sky over our land.  they were very bright, silent, and very fast.  they were probably the distance from us that a helicopter would be, but very fluid and disappeared within 10 seconds.

we thought we were seeing meteors at first, but they were so bright.  they looked man made.  and when they did not streak or die out over time we knew we were seeing something different.  the two lights just turned off at the same time.  i can't express how fast they were.  we have a wide open view of the sky out in the country, and it was unbelievable.
content.summary: 2 silent green led like lights sped across a large area of land and disappeared in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was out getting the cat in it was almost dark due to some dark clouds in the sky. my son came out to help because my cat is reluctant. as we are talking i looked up because i had heard about the super moon. just as i did i saw a light, not real high in the sky. east texas pine trees are up a ways, and i saw it coming from the east and traveling in a straight line. my mind was trying to reason what i was seeing and i was telling my son as i was watching it to look up, look up, look up, he was under the tree. as i backed up he came toward me and turned around and said oh my gosh there it is and then it was gone. nothing there. there was not a sound. we're out in the country and it's quiet out there, if there was sound we would have heard it. it didn't seem that far up to me. my son said he saw two ends and 2 lights but wasn't sure if the one light was a reflection.
content.summary: Looked up saw a bright light moving fast east to west straight line no sound at all. above treetops below clouds as turning to west to watch it was gone

content.detailedDescription: My grandson and his friend were sitting on our back patio. when in the southern sky they saw a greenish orb that split in two and shot off in opposite directions. my grandson ran in the house to tell me to come look at it, but it was gone by the time i got out there.
content.summary: My 20 year old grandson and his friend were looking in the southern sky and they saw a green colored orb that split in two and shot off in oppisit directions.

content.detailedDescription: One light, moving faster than plane or jet, horizontally across the sky, split into two and disappeared.  the sky was clear, no cloud coverage. was witnessed by myself, my mom, and my dad. we were outside watching the super moon( night 2).   we thought wow what is that?  it's too fast to be a jet. the entire witnessing of the event only lasted about 30 seconds., but we all saw the same thing.
content.summary: One light moving faster than plane or jet horizontally across the sky, split into two and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside with mother trying to get cat inside, she said "what is that?!", i was under a tree at the time but i moved to get a look, by the time i caught a glimpse of it, it had already moved from the road which is about 100ft from house, to a little past our house and i saw it in over the back yard. 
was 2 bright lights, bigger than stars but the same type of light given off, one traveling about 10 ft in front of the other, in between the two it was dark but just a bit of a reflection of light was hitting something, couldnt see a shape like a plane or drone or anything like that. there was no noise and it was completely gone in about less than 10 seconds from first seeing it to it disappearing.
also there were some clouds in the sky but it was traveling below the clouds, didnt seem to be falling, more like it was moving in a straight line from east to west.
content.summary: 2 bright lights, like super bright led's, was a span between the two where the light seemed to reflect off something, no noise, moving fast

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at a light waiting to turn left when a very bright light appeared in front of me very far away. it was in the direction of elgin tx and that town is about 10 miles away. it caught my attention because it was real bright and moving towords me and to my slight left at an incredble speed. i first thought it was a fighter jet with after burners on. it moved from about ten miles away to my left side and over the highway in about 6-7 seconds. right before it disappeared it split into two equal balls of light and the second ball just followed the first one. 1 second later the one in the back disappeared and then the one in the front was gone too. no sound and these lights flew strait. they didn't go up or down. just strait and super fast. very bright.
content.summary: Very bright super fast ufo flew in strait line. spit into two then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in my back yard talking on the cell phone when i saw in the ne 2 solid white lights about the size of stars moving very, very fast to the nw, so they were flying east to west just north of me. they were moving faster than any plane i've ever observed.
as they got closer i saw that there were no running lights and no blinking lights as i would normally see on a plane. our home is about 2 miles from a small town airport so i'm used to airplane traffic. when i heard no sound i knew i was looking at something rather interesting.
i called my wife out from the house, but just too late, they disappeared behind some trees. not as if by magic, just that's where their route took them.
it was at this point that i realized that i lost my connection to the person on the other end. when i called them back they said they didn't know what happened. that may be nothing, but i thought to mention it anyway.

i'm mainly filing this report in case others in the area saw it and reported it as well.
content.summary: 2 solid white lights in tandem moving way faster than airplanes flying horizon to horizon making no sound. no running lights, no blinking lights.

content.detailedDescription: Saw blue orb speeding across sky fast then splitting into two and speed off into different direction. caught my attention because it was moving so fast. there was no tail. came across sky over us and then split. it then flew off.
content.summary: Blue orb across sky then split into two

content.detailedDescription: We were just relaxing in the cup de sac and i told my girlfriend to look bc there was a light that was tracking across the sky (seemed over our neighborhood) and then it had a linear path to it. also the acceleration was very quick and it seemed to start from being still too - which was very very odd. split up into two lights that both accelerated to the n pretty fast. one disappears and the other one shortly after. now that i think of it i think the path was linear to almost upward it seems. (slight angle). the most bothersome part was the acceleration from being still.
content.summary: Witnessed a light still and then it accelerated into two - then both vanished. tracked ne to n slightly upward trajectory also.

content.detailedDescription: This is the 5th time that this has happened in my area. it seems to be around anytime my mom's fiance is around. not jumping to conclusions of him being followed by aliens. these things are about the height in the sky as stars, bright like stars but move (and i mean move) fast. the three i just saw not even 10 minutes ago moved faster than any airplane or meteor at that height. plus a meteor doesn't extinguish then reignite. this is the fifth time i've seen them, all in either pairs or threes and move in different directions. one i saw tonight actually shifted from right to left quickly before moving in a straight line very fast eastward. i don't know what it is but this is freaky and i definitely need someone to find out what it is. the fact that every time i go outside with my mom's fiance and look at the stars i always see one slowly move then pick up speed and just move as if it's propelled by something but it's not fast enough that me and my family can trace it for a good 10 seconds and these things occurring from 9-10 pm all the time and having multiple pass by with a minute's time frame makes me awestruck and a little nervous. i lost sight of it because it traveled out of sight. but it was still traveling the same speed. i've seen planes, it's not a plane. i've seen meteors, it's not a meteor. i've seen satellites, it's not a satellite. what is this thing?!?! someone please come and check this out!!!!
content.summary: Objects looking like stars moving too fast for airplanes, too high for planes and no tail so not meteor.

content.detailedDescription:
The skies of calgary are busy in my area.  i have seen so many objects it's ridiculous....Or should i say my camera has.  i didn't see them with my eye.
this is my 4th sighting report today.
i clicked off 14 photos with my camera facing the sun.  please excuse the flares as my lens is badly scratched.  i took the 14 photos and turned them into a video at 8 frames per photo.
it was 2:39 pm mountain time in calgary alberta canada.  
the very bright white object is flying towards the sun and then makes a turn, approximately 60 to 70 degree turn. 
it's a short video as i had only taken 14 photos.  i didn't see it with my eye otherwise i would have kept taking more pics.  i didn't realise my camera was catching something.
content.summary: White object flying towards sun then changing direction

content.detailedDescription: 07/10/2014:  this date, i was returning home from work traveling n/b on sh31 in oxford twsp. warren county in my work truck.  at approximately 2230 hrs. i was passing the warren county recycling center (county dump)when i noticed an object come over the trees to my right.  i leaned hard forward in my seat and looked up into my windshield near the headliner and noticed a nickle sized (at arms length) perfect triangle shaped object with 3 steady lights, one in each extreme corner.  the object, although dark out could be seen, possible due to both overcast and ground light conditions.  it appeared metallic with smooth rounded corners, not unlike an artists conception of the rumored usaf tr-3b "flying triangle."  at this point i felt a bit anxious but was doing my best to look at it without running my vehicle into a tree or worse.  with haste i drove to the traffic light at the intersections of sh31 and sh46 in white twsp. and pulled over to get a better look. after dismounting from my vehicle, i realized the object was gone; however where the object was a moment ago there was a faint glowing "puff of white" (cloud, smoke etc....) this cloud was motionless.  i took two pictures of it with my smart phone prior to continuing down sh46 w/b.  after making a quick turn onto warren county 519 i pulled into the white twsp. recreation center and again dismounted.  the puff of white was still in the southern sky. at this point i took some more pictures and shined my spot light at the object flashing my light on and off at it with no reaction.  when first looking at this "white puff" in the sky i thought maybe it could be the moon behind thick clouds but when i got back to my residence and zoomed in the pictures others and myself could see what appeared to be a triangular shaped object in the "puff of white" as if it was attempting to mask or for lack of a better term, cloak itself. there were some high flying commercial aircraft in the area at the time that i could observe and clearly make out as same.  there was also vehicular traffic in the area going about their business, seemingly unaware.  the puff that i observed in the sky, may in fact have nothing to do with my observations of the triangle as i lost sight of it and did not see the triangle change or move. it should be noted that this is the second time that i have observed an object like this in new jerseys warren county, the former of which was reported.
content.summary: Observed light moving over my vehicle.  when i looked up i could see a physical triangle with 3 glowing lights.  object later may have morphed into glowing cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
This is the 3rd object that showed up on my camera while sitting on my front step.  i made reports for the other 2 already.
this object was seen as i faced ssw at about 212 degrees.  i'm an amateur so these are my best guesses.  it was 3:47 pm on july 12, 2014.
the object showed up in only 1 shot and i had my canon g11 set to continuous shooting at 2 frames per second approximately.  the previous frame and the frame after this shot had nothing in it.
i can't describe the shape.  maybe cone shaped or tubular.  i never saw it with my eyes, i only saw it after i uploaded my photos to the computer.
content.summary: Oval/cone shaped object reflecting sunlight
